reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of GEOB 200, GEOB 300.
Note: This is a wait list for GEOB 402, section 201, Term 2. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.
description: The nature of atmospheric pollutants. The ability of the atmosphere to disperse, transform, and remove pollutants. Air pollution dispersion models. Air quality monitoring, criteria, and standards.
